item.title: Related Resources
item.description: Community Provided OSCAL Content Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program (FedRAMP) Automation GitHub Repository Useful Links GitHub Repository for OSCAL NIST Computer Security Resource Center: OSCAL Videos and Presentations NIST 2nd OSCAL Workshop - February 2 and 3, 2021 Slides are posted under "Agenda" at the bottom.
